Why did the clown go to school? To learn how to hide the bodies!
What do you get when you cross a joke with a rhetorical question? A never-ending nightmare!
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they can cause a nuclear disaster!
How do you make a tissue dance? You put a little boogie in it! And then you watch it as it decays.
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was the only one left standing after the harvest!
Why did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side of the funeral home!
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts!
What did the cannibal do after he dumped his girlfriend? He wiped his butt!
Why did the man with no arms fall off the swing? He had no arms!
Why did the woman with one leg cross the road? To get away from the man with no arms!
Why did the boy drop his ice cream? He was hit by a bus!
Why did the boy drop his second ice cream? He was hit by another bus!
Why did the boy drop his third ice cream? He was hit by a truck!
Why did the boy drop his fourth ice cream? He was hit by a train!
Why did the boy drop his fifth ice cream? He was hit by a plane!
Why did the boy drop his sixth ice cream? He was hit by a meteor!
Why did the boy drop his seventh ice cream? He was hit by a black hole!
Why did the boy drop his eighth ice cream? He realized the futility of existence!
Why did the boy drop his ninth ice cream? He was hit by a bus again!
